title: HOUR 2- John Smoltz Oct 08, 2020
itunes:title: HOUR 2- John Smoltz Oct 08, 2020
description:
Johns Smoltz talks to Dan about the unwritten rules in major league baseball. John says the rules allow the batter's to celebrate, but those same rules does not like it when a pitcher celebrates.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Johns Smoltz talks to Dan about the unwritten rules in major league baseball. John says the rules allow the batter's to celebrate, but those same rules does not like it when a pitcher celebrates.
